mema sakachchawe di 19 n pahala jathika kandayamata kridakayin thoraganime kamituwata pasal krikat sangamaya niyojanaya karamin niyojithayin dedenakuta sahabhagi wimata pera thibu awasthawa yali labaganimatath, siyaluma palath niyojanaya wana paridi siyaluma pahasukam sahithawa usas thakshanika krida puhunu madhyasthana athi kirima, krikat sanchithayata athulathwana sisun sandaha masakata rupiyal 2,500 ka dimanawak laba dima, palamu shreniye krikat puhunukaruwange sudusukam saha pramithiya sadhaniya mattamakata gena eemata piyawara ganima saha pasal krikat puhunukaruwange saha kridakayinge winaya saha sadacharathmaka prathipaththin ihala thalayakata gena eemata awashya katayuthu sampadanaya kirima sambandhawa sakachcha karanu labuwa.
